data.title: Jordan Parham - 2023-24 - Men's Basketball
data.meta_description: Jordan Parham (0) Guard  - Junior (2022-23): Appeared in all 25 games and made seven starts in his third year with the program… Scored 10 or more points on
data.text:
Junior (2022-23): Appeared in all 25 games and made seven starts in his third year with the program… Scored 10 or more points on eight occasions… Transitioned into a reserve role in the second half of the season, providing a scoring boost off the bench… Scored a season-high 20 points while knocking down a trio of three-pointers in a win over Eastern Mennonite on Nov. 26

Sophomore (2021-22): On the court for 26 games ... third on the team with a 36.4% mark from downtown ... averaged 6.4 points and one rebound per game ... scored in double-figures seven times ... scored 17 points in a win over N.C. Wesleyan on Nov. 27 ... turned in a career-best 21 points against No. 1 Randolph-Macon on Jan. 15 ... splashed a season-best five 3-pointers against Randolph on Jan. 26.

Freshman (2020-21): Appeared in four games in his first year with the program ... Scored a season-best seven points vs. Ferrum in a Feb. 11 loss.

Before Lynchburg: All-state, all-region, all-metro, and team MVP for the Falcons ... 1,000-point scorer ... Helped Huguenot to a regional championship as a sophomore ... Honor student.

Personal

Parents: Trena and Wallace

Siblings: Wallace, Dwayne, Sean, Jermaine, Raven
